metadata.dc:author: Armengot, M
Garín, L
Basterra, J
Barona, R
metadata.dc:description: This gross laryngocele caused a chronic obstruction of the upper respiratory airway. Diagnosis become obvious because the aggravation of a chronic bronchopathy slightly developed, which run into a cor pulmonale chronic as well. Incidentally linked with a neck metastasis spread out from a hidden papillary carcinoma of the thyroid gland. The laryngocele was treated by extramucous lateral thyrotomy and the carcinoma removed through subtotal thyroidectomy.
metadata.dc:title: El laringocele. A propósito de un caso de laringocele gigante asociado a carcinoma papilar de tiroides oculto.
[Laryngocele. Report of a case of giant laryngocele associated with occult papillary carcinoma of the thyroid].
